personal.name: Cody Rice Velasquez
personal.introdution: I'm Cody Rice Velasquez—systems whisperer, chaos-to-clarity alchemist, and the brain behind QiAlly & EmpowerQNow. From Evansville roots to reviving broken empires, I bridge the gap between disarray and dynamite success. With over 15 years of experience spanning finance, HR, technology, and operations, I've delivered $3M+ in savings and optimized 200+ systems.

experiences.title: Founder & CEO
experiences.description: Co-founded many over the years current home (now QiAlly LLC) and beta-launched QiLife & QiCall AI modules. Leading comprehensive platform development that unifies client portals, admin control, APIs, AI (RAG/voice/vision), billing, and per-client public websites.

experiences.title: Founder & CEO
experiences.description: Founded SRVGroup with multiple LLCs under the umbrella, expanding service offerings. Launched SRV1NE solopreneur venture, later rebranded to InnovaFlow within QIP ecosystem.

experiences.title: Founder & CEO
experiences.description: Started Servicios Rice-Velasquez, scaling to $1.5M in revenue while still at MSIL. Developed EmpowerQNow tarot & mind map system—melding strategy and spirituality.

experiences.title: Acting Director of HR & Operations
experiences.description: Climbed from Jr. Account Manager to Acting Director of HR & Ops at MSIL—managing 300+ employees and refining SOPs. Delivered $3M+ in savings, optimized 200+ systems, and transformed 80+ solutions and processes.

experiences.title: Founder & CEO
experiences.description: Founded Angel Ayuda LLC during the 2009 crisis, providing computer repair services while studying full time. Achieved fluency in Spanish and deep immersion in Hispanic culture.

experiences.title: Bachelor of Business Administration in HR Management
experiences.description: Graduated with BBA in HR Management. Studied ASL Levels I–II and provided translation and support for deaf employees.

experiences.title: Associate's in Information Systems
experiences.description: Graduated with Associate's in InfoSys, Networking Security cert, CompTIA certified while leading teams at Enkei, IHOP, and Waffle House.

projects.title: QiAlly Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive platform that unifies client portals, admin control, APIs, AI (RAG/voice/vision), billing, and per-client public websites. Built with Cloudflare-first architecture and Supabase backend for scalable, secure multi-tenant operations.

projects.title: EmpowerQNow
projects.description: Developed innovative tarot & mind map system that melds strategy and spirituality. Created a unique approach to business consulting that combines traditional wisdom with modern operational excellence.

projects.title: MSIL Operations Overhaul
projects.description: Led comprehensive operational transformation at MSIL, managing 300+ employees and refining SOPs. Delivered $3M+ in savings through process optimization, systems integration, and workflow automation.
